page.title: 05 AYNHO:CLUBS & SOCIETIES (2)
page.content: The {WOMENS INSTITUTE} is only for women. It meets in the Village Hall each month. They have competitions, discussions, speakers and a cup of tea. Sometimes they go on an outing. {AYNHO GARDENING CLUB} meets in the Village Hall most months of the year. They have speakers who talk on gardening matters. In the summer they visit other gardens and every year they hold a flower show. Some of the members come from Souldern. The {SPORTS CLUB} consists of the FOOTBALL CLUB, HOCKEY CLUB and CRICKET CLUB. They play their matches at the Playing Field there is a pavilion for them to change their clothes. Football and Hockey are played in the winter and Cricket in the summer. Sometimes they play matches in other villages. For {CHURCH ACTIVITIES} see the page on AYNHO CHURCH
